alert.note: Alert for Mayes; Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 3:21AM CDT until August 13 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rogers County in northeastern Oklahoma... Central Mayes County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 320 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Taiwah, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Pryor... Pryor Creek... Chouteau... Inola... Salina... Langley... Adair... Spavinaw... Disney... Pensacola... Hoot Owl... Cherokee State Park... Spavinaw State Park... Sportsmen Acres Community... Taiwah... Tiawah... Strang... Snowdale State Park... Disney Little Blue State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
